summary: Rille, an ostracized and bullied teenager, who only excels in the ping pong room, descends into a life-and-death struggle with his younger, more popular brother when the truth about their father surfaces during their spring break.
cast: Jerry Johansson|Hampus Johansson|Georgi Staykov|Ann-Sofie Nurmi|Frederik Nilsson|Alicia Stewén|Carolina Westmann|William Blomfeldt|Camilla Larsson|Emelie Strömberg|Sten Elfström|Genny Bergvall|Alf Andersson|Sigbritt Nilsson|Kim Cristiansen|Alexander Eriksson|Andreas Holmqvist|Robin Isaksson|Peter Karlsson Björk|Caroline Lundstedt|Denina Sjölund|Johanna Annersand
title: Ping-pongkingen
